sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react";
import "./styles.css";



const Form = () => {

    const [title, setTitle] = useState("");

    const handleSubmit = (e) => {
        e.preventDefault();
        console.log(title)
    }


    return (
        <>
            <form onSubmit={handleSubmit}>
                <input 
                type="text" 
                name="nome" 
                placeholder="Como gostaria de ser chamado?" 
                value={title}
                onChange={(e) => setTitle(e.target.value)}
                />
                    
                <input 
                type="text" 
                name="empresa" 
                placeholder="Em qual empresa vocÃª trabalha?" 
                />
                    
                <input 
                type="email" 
                name="email" 
                placeholder="Digite aqui o seu email" 
                />
                    
                <input 
                type="tel" 
                name="telefone" 
                placeholder="Qual o seu telefone?" 
                />
                    
                <input 
                type="submit" 
                id="enviar_button" 
                value="ENVIAR" 
                /> 
            </form>
        </>
    )
}

export default Form
